body_html:
The optimizers all work for network whose inputs/outputs are partially defined. I can train FCN with unknown input shapes with adam without any problems.

Your error log indicates that you have some trainable variables that are partially defined. This is unsupported and you probably have done something wrong in your code.

body:
The optimizers all work for network whose inputs/outputs are partially defined. I can train FCN with unknown input shapes with adam without any problems.

Your error log indicates that you have some trainable variables that are partially defined. This is unsupported and you probably have done something wrong in your code.
